name: Space Explorers: Reload
description:
During blast-off of the spaceship one of the capsules got lost. The team found out that it was the one that contained all of their clothes. Now they all are about to go on a Space Exploring mission completely naked...“Space explorers: Reload” is a 3D visual novel featuring:
  • A short episodic storyline that touches many interesting themes and topics
  • Brilliant art style, backgrounds and sprites
  • 3D animated characters
